channel.title: [MoparScape Independence]
channel.description:
[b][size=72pt]P[/size][/b]eople, the time has come, we have suffered long enough. It is time that we get INDEPENDECE!
We need to get seperated from MITB, 2 different communities. They do not need us, vice versa. We want our own sections,
- Show-Off - Music - Movies - Phones - Suggest some more people
We want INDEPENDECE!
I have started a group called [The Good Guys], join me, and together, WE SHALL OVERCOME!
VICTORY SHALL BE OURS!!!!!!!!!!!
[size=36pt]Already on the team:
- MistaBigBoss - Acrodox - Fridder[/size] [size=36pt]- Ix Soulcist xI[/size] [size=36pt]- OmgItsShane[/size] [size=36pt]- ExtremeX-Scape™[/size] [size=36pt]- reyx7[/size]

item.title: [MoparScape Independence]
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

NO:

  1. It would require more boards for us to moderate and we simply cannot keep up with the shit moparscapers spew as it is.

  2. Go to Moparisthebest.com and post in the correct sections

  3. You will not be treated like a fucktard on mitb as long as you don’t act like a fucktard. Perfect example: When Frell started posting on mitb he was raped repetitively by other members for being a moron. After taking a few moments and cutting the shit frell is now a semi respected member on both boards. Of course he will always be remembered as a Fox news slag.

Read full topic

item.title: [MoparScape Independence]
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:90, topic:403501”]Want the Moderators to listen? How about you do something constructive for the community and show that you maybe deserve a new board. Simply ranting doesn’t get you anywhere.[/quote]Makes sense.

Though I do think that this topic is unnecessary as I believe mitb won’t do this. I also disagree with the topic creator, forgot his name I remember it sounded cool though, because I think it’s a pretty cool feature that we’re merged together, you get to see all the people that you’ve known on both sites, the forum posts are very high, etc. 'Tis my opinion though.

Read full topic

item.title: [MoparScape Independence]
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:89, topic:403501”][quote author=tL link=topic=500563.msg3661341#msg3661341 date=1310365632]
fuck off idiot

you’re insane.
[/quote][/quote]
And you think the mods are going to listen with 5 locked topics on the first page of this board?
Sorry to say, with the attitude that some of you have shown in this thread. It’s hardly surprising that you aren’t getting the boards/topic you want.

@The Wander, Quoting Fuck off.
@asshole_rule, What a fucking leecher
@LilXCj, B2300 T4nk and all the other idiots that spammed here.

Want the Moderators to listen? How about you do something constructive for the community and show that you maybe deserve a new board. Simply ranting doesn’t get you anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: [MoparScape Independence]
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:71, topic:403501”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=500563.msg3661318#msg3661318 date=1310363568]
This is a Runescape Emulation Community, having a general discussion is probably as far as it should go without drifting to far from the forums actual purpose. Plus, all the boards you suggested all fit in the general discussion criteria, so you could just post that all here?
[/quote]

everything fits in it dumbass.[/quote]

Thanks for disregarding the whole point of my post. All sarcasm intended.

There is no need to make a new board for every single topic you can pull out of a hat. Especially when we have a General Section that can easily tend to all the content that has absolutely nothing to do with RS emulation.

Read full topic
